name: Bookworm Wordy Wonder Bundle
storyline:
Conquer three storybooks and fight over 150 foes in Bookworm Adventures.
Survive three all-new books with 10 chapters each in Bookworm Adventures Vol. 2.
Boost your word power with fantastic gems, potions and treasures!
Unlock mini-games, a fast-paced Arena mode, and the trivia-packed Tome of Knowledge.
summary:
Bookworm Wordy Wonder Bundle is a compilation that contains the following games:
Bookworm Deluxe
Bookworm Adventures
Bookworm Adventures Volume 2
